section.title: Capacity Reporting and Monasca Transform
section.para: Capacity reporting is a new feature in &kw-hos; which will provide cloud operators an overall capacity (available, used and remaining) information via the ops console so that the cloud operator can ensure that cloud resource pools have sufficient capacity to meet demands of users. Cloud operator would also be able to set thresholds and set alarms so that he gets notified when the thresholds are met.

listitem.para: Host Capacity - CPU/Disk/Memory: Used, Available and Remaining Capacity - for entire cloud installation or by host
VM Capacity - CPU/Disk/Memory: Allocated, Available and Remaining - for entire cloud installation, by host or by project
Disk Capacity - Used, Available and Remaining Capacity - for entire cloud installation or by project

section.para: In addition to the over all capacity, certain rollup view with appropriate slices for example view by a particular project, region, compute node are also provided. Graphs also show the trend and how the capacity changed over time.
